: 〈Katopesla〉 with an energy cost of 4.

title: Katopesla, Sonic Justice
skill:
: 〈Katopesla〉 with an energy cost of 1.


: When an opponent's Battle Card with an energy cost of 4 or less attacks, negate the attack, then negate this skill for the turn.

title: Katopesla, Universe 3 Policeman
skill: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Universe 3》 card among them, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Nigrisshi, from the Shadows
skill:
When this card is placed in a Drop Area from a Battle Area or Combo Area, it is placed at the bottom of its owner's deck instead.
Choose 1 of your black Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 and send it to its owner's Warp : Play this card from your Drop Area.

title: Viara, Everlasting Assault
skill:
When this card is placed in a Drop Area from a Battle Area or Combo Area, it is placed at the bottom of its owner's deck instead.
Choose 1 of your black Battle Cards with an energy cost of 4 and send it to its owner's Warp : Play this card from your Drop Area.

title: Jiren, Survival of the Fittest

title: Vuon, the Righteous

title: Kahseral, the Righteous
skill:
When you play this card, draw 1 card, then your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and sends it to their Warp.
When this card attacks, choose up to 1 Leader Card and up to 1 Battle Card other than this card, and those cards get +5000 power for the turn.

title: Protector of the People
skill:
Negate the attack, then you may choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do, choose 1 of your Leader Cards and it gains the following effect for the turn:
・ When this card is attacked by a Battle Card, it gets +5000 power for the turn.

title: Not Even a Scratch
skill:
Negate the attack.
, send this card from your Drop Area to your Warp : Draw 1 card.

title: Universe 3, Assemble!
skill: Choose up to 2 black Battle Cards with energy costs of 2 or less in your Drop Area, and play them with their skills negated for the turn.

title: Bollarator's Elastic Strike!
skill: Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp, then choose 1 of your Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp.

title: The Final Mission
skill: Choose 4 Battle Cards with energy costs between 3 and 7 in your Drop Area, and shuffle them into your deck : Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards with 20000 power or less and send them to their owners' Warps.

title: Phantom Fist
skill:
If you have 4 or more energy, you can activate this card from your hand by placing 1 red card in your hand in your Drop Area instead of paying this card's energy cost.
At the start of your opponent's next Main Phase, choose up to 1 of your blue energy, switch it to Active Mode, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -15000 power until the start of your next Main Phase.

title: Sleepy Boy Technique
skill: Negate the attack, draw 2 cards, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and return it to its owner's hand.

title: Arack & Cucatail, Universe 5 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
When placing this card in your energy from any area, you may choose 1 red card and 1 green card in your Drop Area and send them to your Warp. If you do, negate this card's skill.
: This card gets +14000 power and until the start of your next Main Phase.

title: Liquiir & Korun, Universe 8 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
This card gains power equal to the total power of the cards switched to Rest Mode by this skill for the battle; draw 2 cards, then choose 2 of your opponent's Battle Cards and they get -20000 power for the turn.
If your Leader Card is red and you have red or green Battle Cards in play, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2.

title: Iwne & Awamo, Universe 1 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
When placing this card in your energy from any area, you may choose 1 blue card and 1 yellow card in your Drop Area and send them to your Warp. If you do, negate this card's skill.
: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, place it at the bottom of its owner's deck, then at the start of your opponent's next Main Phase, choose up to 2 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode.

title: Geene & Martinne, Universe 12 Destroyer & Angel
skill:

title: Quitela & Conic, Universe 4 Destroyer & Angel
Sidra & Mohito, Universe 9 Destroyer & Angel

title: Mosco & Kampari, Universe 3 Destroyer & Angel
skill:

KO this card : When your opponent plays a Battle Card, draw 1 card.

title: Rumsshi & Kusu, Universe 10 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
When placing this card in your energy from any area, you may choose 1 blue card and 1 green card in your Drop Area and send them to your Warp. If you do, negate this card's skill.
: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, KO it, then draw 1 card.

title: Beerus & Whis, Universe 7 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
If you have 3 or more energy : When one of your red or blue Battle Cards is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill, play this card from your hand, and you can't play another copy of this card for the turn.
If it's your opponent's turn : When you play this card, at the end of the turn, place this card at the bottom of its owner's deck from the Battle Area, then draw 1 card.

title: Champa & Vados, Universe 6 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
When placing this card in your energy from any area, you may choose 1 red card and 1 blue card in your Drop Area and send them to your Warp. If you do, negate this card's skill.
, return this card to its owner's hand : Choose up to 1 Extra Card in your deck with an energy cost of 3 or more, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Heles & Sawar, Universe 2 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
When placing this card in your energy from any area, you may choose 1 green card and 1 yellow card in your Drop Area and send them to your Warp. If you do, negate this card's skill.
: Choose up to 2 green or yellow Battle Cards in your hand with energy costs of 2 or less, play them with their skills negated for the turn, then your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and places it in their Drop Area.

title: Belmod & Marcarita, Universe 11 Destroyer & Angel
skill:
If you have 5 or more energy : When you play this card, your opponent chooses 3 cards in their hand and places them in their Drop Area.
When this card is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill, choose any number of Battle Cards in your Drop Area with energy costs of 2 or less for which the total cost adds up to 4 or less, and play them with their skills negated for the turn.
